Body: How do I set the TAGs of a device in the IoT Hub Device Management API's There doesnt seem to be a specific method for this

The (C#) sample in the SDK shows how to do this. You have to pick the correct branch for this to be included.

Here's the link:https://github.com/Azure/azure-iot-sdks/tree/dmpreview

It deserializes a device object using this JSON: { "deviceId": "Device11-7ce4a850"
column16:
"bacon" ] }

and then passes it to the Registery Manager:

registryManager.AddDeviceAsync(device);

"
